name: Document
description: Any type of document file such as PDF, DOC, or TXT

name: Image
description: Image files including JPG, PNG, and GIF formats

name: Video
description: Video files in formats like MP4, AVI, or MOV

name: Audio
description: Audio files such as MP3, WAV, or AAC

name: Spreadsheet
description: Spreadsheet files like XLSX or CSV

name: Presentation
description: Presentation files such as PPT or PPTX

name: Archive
description: Compressed archive files like ZIP or RAR
